CustomField.description:
Original formula: "ref:_" & LEFT($Organization.Id,5) & SUBSTITUTE(RIGHT($Organization.Id,10), "0", "" ) & "._" & LEFT(Id,5) & SUBSTITUTE(RIGHT(Id,10), "0", "" ) & ":ref"
10/6. Changed RIGHT( Id, 4) to RIGHT( Id, 5)
CustomField.formula: "ref:!" + LEFT( $Organization.Id, 6) + SUBSTITUTE(RIGHT($Organization.Id,10), "0", "" ) +".!"+ LEFT( Id, 4) + SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(Id, RIGHT( Id, 5), ""), LEFT( Id, 4), ""), "0", "") + RIGHT( Id, 6) + ":ref"
CustomField.label: Case Reference
